comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

OS: OS X 10.6
FF Version: 7 latest and 8 latest

Open two separate windows of FF.
Going around the web on each window with each window having only one tab open.
On one of the windows, press Cmd+W.




Actual results:

The window did not close.


Expected results:

The window should be closed, and it used to be closed when I was using FF 6 or earlier version of FF 7.

comments.text: Hey, you can close this. It is patched :)
